name: water-spout
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Inflicts more damage if the user’s HP is high.
flavor_text.emerald: Inflicts more damage if the user’s HP is high.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The higher the user’s HP, the more powerful this attack becomes.
